__e: Comrades, I don't think I need you anymore.
I believe my comrades didn't die in vain
Dear comrades, don't let them make of me something else... different from what I am and all I want to be:
He's in the room with his buddies, then he has to blow the door in?
I'll just wait here with all your pals and all the women you slept with.
Who knows, maybe I would've turned out like the rest of my friends, and you'd be trying to catch me.
Look, all your comrades are on the other side.
Now I know what all the fellas are talking about.
I don't know what the comrades are doing there again... A fata morgana.
"Why were your comrades, left and right, killed... "...and you survived?" You have no explanation for that.
I've decided to use you to send a little message mainly to your comrades in law enforcement.
We have no right to ask for help we comrades to health?
A mere woman just can't compete with the joy of being with your comrades in arms.
I'm not one of your army pals!
He used to go there with his friends.
